parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
设置请求和接收消息的语言类型，默认为**zh**。取值：
- **zh**：中文
- **en**：英文

parameters.name: LineId
parameters.description:
自定义线路唯一ID。<props="china">可通过调用[DescribeCustomLines](https://help.aliyun.com/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describecustomlines?spm=a2c4g.11186623.help-menu-search-29697.d_0)获取</props>
<props="intl">可通过调用[DescribeCustomLines](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describecustomlines?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d_0)获取</props>
